jcr:content.jcr:title: Discover Disney Magic Camporee hosted by Community 2

data.details:
Come experience the happiest camp on earth! This camporee is for all Girl Scout levels and families! Throughout the weekend, Juniors, Cadettes, Seniors, and Ambassadors will explore and canoe like Pocahontas, shoot a bow and arrow like Merida, act "Goofy" and make new friends. Daisies and Brownies will also explore like Pocahontas, play "Goofy" games, sing and dance like Disney princesses and have their very own Disney Parade! Don't miss out on all the magical fun we have in store! 

** Camporees are open to all registered Girl Scouts of Gateway Council. All adults must be registered and approved volunteers.
** Please follow the adult to girl ratios in safety Activity Checkpoints.  Note: Daises must have a one to one ratio.
** For safety and supervision reasons, troops and individuals are not permitted to bring non-Girl Scouts or siblings.
**  Last day to register: February 26

$30/girl, $30/adult
Contact: Andrea Ruark, Community 2 Camporee Chair, aruark@comcast.net
